ygData.subject: Re: Darkforge AC upped.
ygData.msgSnippet: Didnt know this, i am stuck at work...8) Wish it were no drop too... But glad they at least balanced our armor.. Now for the spells.... ... From: Krukhan
ygData.messageBody:
Didnt know this, i am stuck at work...8) Wish it were no drop too... But
glad they at least balanced our armor..
Now for the spells....
----- Original Message -----
From: Krukhan Garabash <krukhan@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 03, 1999 12:18 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Darkforge AC upped.


> From: "Krukhan Garabash" <krukhan@...>
>
> in case ya didn't know...
>
> "The entire set of the Armor or Ro (Paladin class specific armor) and
> Darkforge (ShadowKnight class armor) has received an increase in AC."
>
> direct form today's patch message.
